entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
